short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pixel Danger Zone:Battle Royale available on Chrome Browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pixel Danger Zone is first person online shooter with battle royale game mode. We combined realistic weapons with the pixel world, so many cool skins for your favorite weapons are waiting for you in the game!

Go to the Extension tab (in the top-right side, between search address and settings, you have to click a gray piece ). After you open the Extension tab, pin Pixel Danger Zone:Battle Royale extension. Now, whenever you want to play, just click the extension located in the top-right corner.
